page.title: 03COMMUNITY PLAY (CONT)
page.content: some of the concerns,conflicts and opportunities in Islington today.A particular effort was made to involve people with little or no previous experience of this activity.20% of all participants were from ethnic minority c ommunities,and 31% lived in council accomodation.Of these,64% of the former and 49% of the latter had 'Never done anything like this before'.According to a report the production 'met and often exceeded peoples expectations'.The majority (80%) of those responding to the survey were seen as very keen to participate in more activities. Significantly,among those who had had no previous experience the level of interest was high.The follow up phase is aimed to build on the confidence, and energy generated by phase one.An Arts Association has been formed to develop work in the locality.
